'Very fast and dependable. A true professional.'

- guru clients 

Consistently ranked in the top 10% of guru writers, I am an experienced author with six successful and critically acclaimed novels in print. The 'Agent of Rome' series is published in the UK by Hodder & Stoughton and can be found on Amazon, Goodreads and elsewhere. Recently described by The Times as 'gripping', the series has been translated into Spanish and Dutch.  
As a freelance writer, I have completed more than 200 jobs for clients, 'ghosting' six full-length novels, six screenplays, numerous short stories and other projects. Two of my own feature scripts have recently been optioned. 
I have a degree in English and American history (2:1, University of Sussex) 
As a teacher with ten years experience, I am a considerate, constructive mentor and a trustworthy and committed individual.
I prefer to work for a fixed rate via guru's 'safepay' system. I always ensure close collaboration through regular updates and discussions.

abstrac: Experienced, innovative copywriter and online marketer. Specializing in marketing copy, website building and SEO, Google AdWords, and Facebook ads.
bio:
I'm an SEO-sensitive marketing copywriter, WordPress website builder, and pay-per-click marketer. I began in direct response marketing and migrated to online marketing, with over 20 years’ total experience.

I’ve held marketing positions from product manager to Executive VP-Marketing.  My specialties include copywriting for direct mail, email and websites, building WordPress sites, developing unique selling propositions and positioning, coordinated online/email campaigns, pay-per-click marketing (Google Adwords and Facebook ads), and search engine optimization.

I have done marketing work in a number of fields, including:
• Education and Training
• Accounting and Tax Services
• Banking and Finance
• Corporate Training
• Consumer Products
• Government Contractors
• Sales Training
• Financial Expertise
• Career Development
• Continuity Products

I hold a BA degree in Journalism and an MBA with emphasis in marketing, both from the University of South Florida.  While I have more recently specialized in distance and online education, my background also includes heavy experience with direct response mail and marketing of consumer goods, including three years at L’eggs hosiery and 7 years as head of marketing at Hamilton Collection in Jacksonville, FL.  You can see my career in more detail on my LinkedIn profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rongregory/

Let’s chat to see if there’s a match with your needs!
I work on weekdays and sometimes on weekends, if needed.  Larger assignments are broken into two to four milestones.

abstrac: We don’t just build websites, we build your business.
bio:
Core Web Connections is a reputable Web Development Company in New Delhi, providing unmatched web design and development services. Working forward to fulfil our aim of helping their clients make a distinguishing online presence, we offer complete solution right from creating your web presence to helping you manage your website efficiently.

We hold expertise in handling everything from advanced web applications and e-commerce solutions to simple HTML & CSS projects. Our professional web designers provide a sensible blend of interactive technology and matchless designs to create attention-grabbing and vivid impression that has a lasting impact on the customers. We follow a unique approach to web design and emphasise on creating an interactive and engaging web environment for your clients.
 
At guru.com, we are one of the top 10 service providers offering web and mobile design and development services, creating html and e-commerce websites besides also offering mobile (android and iOS) development, application development and graphic design services (logo designing, desktop publishing and stationery designing).

A 30% deposit of the total fee payable under our proposal is due immediately upon you instructing us to proceed with the website design and development work. 20% shall be due upon decided first milestone, followed by another 20% upon second milestone. The remaining 30% shall become due when the work is completed to your reasonable satisfaction but subject to the terms of the “approval of work” clauses bellow. We reserve the right not to commence any work until the deposit has been paid in full. The 30% deposit is only refundable if we have not fulfilled our obligations to deliver the work required under the agreement. The deposit is not refundable if the development work has been started and you terminate the contract through no fault of ours.

On completion of the work you will be notified and have the opportunity to review it. You must notify us in writing of any unsatisfactory points within 7 days of such notification. Any of the work which has not been reported in writing to us as unsatisfactory within the 7-day review period will be deemed to have been approved. Once approved, or deemed approved, work cannot subsequently be rejected and the contract will be deemed to have been completed and the 30% balance of the project price will become due.
